title: Attempting to reconnect over & over
body: Alt tabbing seems to make it worse. Can't even play more than 60 seconds without getting dc'd. Alt tabbing seems to almost make it more frequent?

replies.body:
To be honest, I'm not entirely sure why alt-tabbing would make it worse, but since it seems that you are consistently getting disconnected throughout the game, it seems that the root cause is some sort of connection issue.  In order to get this resolved, make sure to complete all of the steps found in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  It has the most common solutions that should stop these kinds of DC's.

Let me know if you are still experiencing the same issues!

Had a comcast guy come out and help me. Ended up being a problem with my router/modem (which were brand new) router was set to receive IPv4 and it was suppose to be set for IPv6. Simply going into my router > Advanced set up > IPv6 > enable, and I'm back up and running. Not sure if this is a solution for the rest of you, most likely not.

Im having the same issue and It started after the patch before mage update. I play on mac client if that matters, but its just constant DCing or it doesn't let me move but everyone else around me can move and i can still type to them and all that so I know I'm not lagged out. At first i thought it was my ISP and my Mouse for both problems but after swapping out mouses and also checking the pads on the old one i now know it wasn't the mouse. i called my ISP and asked them to restart or "Ping" it for me and it didn't change. I have perfect connection on ANY other games i play and i can even type to my friends in the game chat while it says I'm dc'd. To be honest I'm not really sure how i can help with this problem but some feedback would be nice
i myself have done most if not all of these LoL is the only game im having an issue with out of no where.
im having the same issue almost accept everything is completely unplayable but every other game ive played is fine and same with browser videos etc..
